Phobias babies arrive at the battle sight, spreading out attempting 
to connect themselves to the participants of the battle. Each one 
scans the battlefield for a Maximal or Predicon signatures, locking 
on to thier designated assignments.

Back at his ship Phobia watches the map for his babies locations, he 
knows that every bot and the ship could see his babies approaching he 
hoped that the battle would upset the scanners enough to accomplish 
his task, he sees the battles not going well for the maximals so he 
decides to take matters into his own hands.

"Computer lock onto an area outside of the battle zone. guns at 10% 
Fire"
"Warning 10%power not sufficient to do damage to target," the 
computer responds.
"Confirm orders and fire."
Phobias ship lights up as its front guns fire, it hits outside the 
battle zone with a bang, burning grass and leaving a charred circle 
on the ground.
"That should get someones attention."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot fires at all Predicons. Then Megatron's message comes over the
> comlink.
> "Oh SHIT!! What do we do now?"
